# Generated by Jekyll

# Allow all search engine crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: {{ site.url }}/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and cache directories
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /.jekyll-cache/
Disallow: /_site/
Disallow: /Gemfile
Disallow: /Gemfile.lock

# Allow all assets to be indexed
Allow: /assets/

# Crawl-delay (optional - for polite crawling)
# Crawl-delay: 10
